languages.text: "Запрашиваем ответ — истинно ли утверждение, что Мессия, почитавшийся павшим, вернулся? Истинно ли утверждение, что Цикл будет прерван?"
"Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
languages.original_text: "Запрашиваем ответ — истинно ли утверждение, что Мессия, почитавшийся павшим, вернулся? Истинно ли утверждение, что Цикл будет прерван?"

traits.locale_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

languages.text: “进行询问。被认为陨落的弥赛亚已经归来，这种说法是真的吗？循环必将终止，这种说法是真的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: “进行询问。弥赛亚已经陨落，这种说法是真的吗？循环必将终止，这种说法是真的吗？”

languages.text: « Question. L'affirmation selon laquelle le messie considéré comme déchu est revenu est-elle vraie ? L'affirmation selon laquelle le Cycle va être interrompu est-elle vraie ? »
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: « Question. L'affirmation selon laquelle le messie considéré comme déchu est revenu est-elle vraie ? L'affirmation selon laquelle le Cycle va être interrompu est-elle vraie ? »

languages.text: «Pregunta: ¿Es verdad que ha regresado el mesías que se consideraba derrocado? ¿Es verdad que el Ciclo se interrumpirá?».
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: «Pregunta: ¿Es verdad que ha regresado el mesías que se consideraba derrocado? ¿Es verdad que el Ciclo se interrumpirá?».

languages.text: 「質問だ。堕落したと思われていた救世主が戻ってきたという発言は真実なのか？サイクルは廃止されるという発言は本当か？」
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: 「質問だ。堕落したと思われていた救世主が戻ってきたという発言は真実なのか？サイクルは廃止されるという発言は本当か？」

languages.text: "Anfrage. Stimmt die Aussage, dass der als gefallen geltende Messias zurückgekehrt ist? Stimmt die Aussage, dass der Zyklus unterbrochen wird?"
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage. Stimmt die Aussage, dass der als gefallen geltende Messias zurückgekehrt ist? Stimmt die Aussage, dass der Zyklus unterbrochen wird?"

languages.text: "Sual: Öldüğü sanılan Mesih'in geri döndüğü doğru mu? Döngü'nün süreğinin bozulacağı doğru mu?"
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah considered fallen has come back true? Is the statement that the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
